title: Configure Azure AD B2C Tenant & User Flows
description: Setup B2C tenant, define User Flows (SignUp/SignIn), configure Identity Providers, and register API/Client applications.
sprint_goal: Establish core security, authentication, and compliance auditing foundation
acceptance_criteria: B2C Tenant active; App Registrations created; Client Secrets in Key Vault
definition_of_done: Configuration applied via Terraform; Token issuance verified via Postman
deployment_notes: Apply to Dev and Staging environments

title: Implement NestJS Passport Strategy & Guards
description: Develop the backend authentication module using @nestjs/passport and passport-azure-ad to validate B2C JWTs.
sprint_goal: Establish core security, authentication, and compliance auditing foundation
acceptance_criteria: AuthGuard validates Bearer token signature; Invalid tokens return 401; Claims parsed
definition_of_done: Unit tests for Guard logic passing; Integration test with mock B2C token

title: Implement User Sync Webhook
description: Create a secure webhook or API connector to synchronize B2C user creation events with the local PostgreSQL users table.
sprint_goal: Establish core security, authentication, and compliance auditing foundation
acceptance_criteria: User creation in B2C triggers local DB insertion; Idempotency handling; Error logging
definition_of_done: Integration test simulating B2C callback passing; Retry mechanism verified
deployment_notes: Requires public endpoint for B2C callback or tunnel
business_value: Ensures data consistency between IDP and app

title: Implement Audit Service & OpenSearch Integration
description: Develop the centralized audit service to publish critical events to OpenSearch for immutable logging.
sprint_goal: Establish core security, authentication, and compliance auditing foundation
acceptance_criteria: Events are serialized to JSON; Sent to OpenSearch index; Searchable via API
definition_of_done: Logs appearing in OpenSearch dashboard; Audit interceptor created

title: Mobile Signature Capture Component
description: Implement React Native canvas component to capture customer signature as an image.
sprint_goal: Establish core security, authentication, and compliance auditing foundation
acceptance_criteria: User can draw signature; Signature saved as PNG; Clear/Undo functionality
definition_of_done: Tested on iOS and Android devices

title: Implement Mapbox Draw Component (Next.js)
description: Integrate Mapbox GL JS with mapbox-gl-draw plugin in the Admin UI to allow polygon creation and editing.
sprint_goal: Implement core service logic including geospatial routing and admin service area definition
acceptance_criteria: Map renders with controls; User can draw/edit/delete polygons; Coordinates accessible in state
definition_of_done: Visual verification of drawing tools; Component reusable
business_value: Allows admins to define service territories

title: Backend GeoJSON Validation & Storage
description: Create API endpoint to receive GeoJSON, validate geometry (closure, self-intersection), and store in PostGIS.
sprint_goal: Implement core service logic including geospatial routing and admin service area definition
acceptance_criteria: API accepts GeoJSON Polygon; Invalid polygons rejected; Data stored in geometry column
definition_of_done: Integration tests with valid/invalid GeoJSON passing

title: Implement Point-in-Polygon Routing Logic
description: Develop the service method that takes a lat/long and queries PostGIS to find containing Service Area polygons.
sprint_goal: Implement core service logic including geospatial routing and admin service area definition
acceptance_criteria: Query returns correct Service Center for given point; Handles overlapping areas; Performance < 200ms
definition_of_done: Unit tests with boundary cases passing; Spatial index created

title: Backend Signature Upload & Link
description: Create endpoint to receive signature image, upload to Blob Storage, and link to Service Request.
sprint_goal: Implement core service logic including geospatial routing and admin service area definition
acceptance_criteria: Image stored in secure container; URL saved to DB; Only assigned tech can upload

title: Mobile Camera UI & Invoice Upload
description: Implement camera interface for invoice scanning and file upload logic in React Native app.
sprint_goal: Deliver advanced data features: OCR for consumers and Analytics for brands
acceptance_criteria: User can take photo or select from gallery; Image compressed; Uploaded to backend
definition_of_done: Tested on physical iOS and Android devices

title: OCR Processing Worker with Circuit Breaker
description: Implement background worker to process invoice images using Azure AI Document Intelligence, wrapped in Polly circuit breaker.
sprint_goal: Deliver advanced data features: OCR for consumers and Analytics for brands
acceptance_criteria: Extracts Date, Model, Serial; Handles failures gracefully; Updates registration draft
definition_of_done: Resilience tests passing (simulated outages); Data extraction verified

title: Implement Analytics API (Read Replica)
description: Create reporting endpoints connecting to PostgreSQL Read Replica to aggregate product and service data.
sprint_goal: Deliver advanced data features: OCR for consumers and Analytics for brands
acceptance_criteria: Queries run on Read Replica; Aggregations for faults/sales; Performance < 1s
definition_of_done: Load tests confirm Read Replica usage

title: Brand Dashboard & PDF Export (Frontend)
description: Build React dashboard using Recharts and implement client-side PDF generation logic.
sprint_goal: Deliver advanced data features: OCR for consumers and Analytics for brands
acceptance_criteria: Charts render data correctly; PDF layout is professional; Export works across browsers
definition_of_done: Visual QA passed; Cross-browser testing complete
business_value: Delivers visible value to Brand Admins

title: Implement WebSocket Gateway (NestJS)
description: Setup NestJS WebSocket Gateway with authentication guards to handle high-frequency location streams.
sprint_goal: Implement complex real-time location tracking for technicians
acceptance_criteria: Secure WSS connection; Auth via JWT; Room/Channel management for Service Requests
definition_of_done: Load test with mock clients passing
deployment_notes: Configure WebSocket support in Gateway/Load Balancer

title: Implement Redis Location Buffer
description: Create a caching layer using Redis to store the 'latest' location state to reduce DB write pressure.
sprint_goal: Implement complex real-time location tracking for technicians
acceptance_criteria: Location writes go to Redis first; Read latency < 10ms; TTL configured

title: Implement TimescaleDB Archival Worker
description: Create an async worker/cron that flushes buffered location paths from Redis to TimescaleDB for permanent history.
sprint_goal: Implement complex real-time location tracking for technicians
acceptance_criteria: Bulk insert into TimescaleDB hypertable; Data consistency check; Redis buffer cleanup
definition_of_done: Data audit after load test confirmed

title: Mobile Background Geolocation Implementation
description: Integrate react-native-background-geolocation to capture GPS coordinates reliably even when app is backgrounded.
sprint_goal: Implement complex real-time location tracking for technicians
acceptance_criteria: Coordinates captured in background; Battery optimization; Foreground Service notification
definition_of_done: Field test with physical device successful; Battery usage within limits

title: Mobile Map View & Technician Tracking UI
description: Implement map view in consumer app to display technician location pin updating in real-time.
sprint_goal: Implement complex real-time location tracking for technicians
acceptance_criteria: Map renders; Technician pin moves smoothly; ETA displayed
